amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund for studying the effect of cooperation with local law enforcement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4373 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4373 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S2063; text: CR S2063) To establish a reserve fund for studying the effect of cooperation with local law enforcement.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4373 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4373 proposed by Senator Reid.
